movies.title: North Country
movies.plot: A fictionalized account of the first major successful sexual harassment case in the United States -- Jenson vs. Eveleth Mines, where a woman who endured a range of abuse while working as a miner filed and won the landmark 1984 lawsuit.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 17 nominations.

events.title: Lois Jenson, who Josey Aimes is based on, files a sexual harassment lawsuit against her employer
Lois Jenson, who Josey Aimes is based on, quits her job
a settlement is reached between the mine and its sexually harassed employees
